				<script type="text/javascript">
		  window.ga4Dims = window.ga4Dims || {};

		  const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
		  const isGA4DebugMode = urlParams.has('debug');

		  const targetKeys = [
			'zephr_tracking_id',
			'ga_aut_id',
			'aqfer_puu',
		  ];

		  const intervalTime = 250;
		  const maxWaitTime = 2000;

		  function checkForRequiredDim() {
			const foundKey = targetKeys.find(key => window.ga4Dims.hasOwnProperty(key) && window.ga4Dims[key] !== null);

			if (foundKey !== undefined) {
			  gtag('event', 'page_view', window.ga4Dims);
			  clearInterval(intervalId);

			  if (isGA4DebugMode) {
				console.log(`At least one key found with a non-null value: ${foundKey}. Sending the page_view.`);
			  }
			} else {
			  const elapsedTime = Date.now() - startTime;
			  if (isGA4DebugMode) {
				console.log(`None of the keys found with a non-null value. Elapsed time: ${elapsedTime} ms`);
			  }

			  if (elapsedTime >= maxWaitTime) {
				gtag('event', 'page_view', window.ga4Dims);
				clearInterval(intervalId);
				if (isGA4DebugMode) {
				  console.log(`Maximum wait time exceeded. Stopping the search and send the page_view.`);
				}
			  }
			}
		  }

		  const startTime = Date.now();
		  const intervalId = setInterval(checkForRequiredDim, intervalTime);

		</script>

					});

		<script  type="text/plain"  class="optanon-category-C0024">
			(function(i,s,o,g,r,a,m){i['GoogleAnalyticsObject']=r;i[r]=i[r]||function(){
			(i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},i[r].l=1*new Date();a=s.createElement(o),
			m=s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];a.async=1;a.src=g;m.parentNode.insertBefore(a,m)
			})(window,document,'script','//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga');

			(function() {

				// Set the default options for the Google Analytics "create" function.
				var gaCreateOptions = {
					trackingId: "UA-3922003-6",
					cookieDomain: 'auto',
					useAmpClientId: true
				};

				// Add the allowLinker option if it is configured and found in PHP.
									gaCreateOptions.allowLinker = true;
					
				var isLsAvailable = function() {
					var test = 'test';
					try {
						window.localStorage.setItem(test, test);
						window.localStorage.removeItem(test);
						return true;
					} catch (e) {
						return false;
					}
				}

				// Bail early and use the old method if we do not have localStorage in this browser.
				if ( ! isLsAvailable() ) {
					ga( 'create', gaCreateOptions );
					return;
				}

				// If we have a GA clientId in the URL.
				var haveClientIdInURL = false;

				// First, check for linker param in URL and let GA use that for our clientId if it exists.
				// Check if URLSearchParams is available, otherwise use a polyfill function.
				if ( 'function' === typeof URLSearchParams ) {
					var urlParams = new URLSearchParams( window.location.search );
					if ( urlParams.get( '_ga' ) ) {
						haveClientIdInURL = true;
					}
				} else {
					/**
					 * A polyfill for older browsers like IE.
					 * @link https://caniuse.com/#feat=urlsearchparams
					 * @link https://davidwalsh.name/query-string-javascript
					 */
					var getUrlParameter = function(name) {
						name = name.replace( /[\[]/, '\\[' ).replace( /[\]]/, '\\]' );
						var regex = new RegExp('[\\?&]' + name + '=([^&#]*)');
						var results = regex.exec( location.search );
						return results === null ? false : decodeURIComponent( results[1].replace( /\+/g, ' ' ) );
					};
					if ( getUrlParameter( '_ga' ) ) {
						haveClientIdInURL = true;
					}
				}

				// Assume the GA Cookie is not present.
				var hasGACookie = false;

				// Try to get the GA Cookie.
				var GACookie = document.cookie.split(';').filter(function(item) {
					return item.trim().indexOf('_ga=') === 0
				} );

				// Check if we have a cookie.
				if ( GACookie.length ) {
					// If the cookie value is not empty we have a GA cookie.
					hasGACookie = GACookie[0].trim().length > 4 ? true : false;
				}

				// Id to use for localStorage object which holds the GA clientId and expire time.
				var gaClientIdLocalStorageId = 'nyp_ga_client_id';

				// If we don't have a clientId in the URL and there is no GA cookie set, we look in localStorage for one.
				if ( ! haveClientIdInURL && ! hasGACookie ) {

					// If no linker param and no GA cookie, we check in localStorage for the GA clientId.
					var nypGALocalStorage = window.localStorage.getItem( gaClientIdLocalStorageId ) || '{}';
					var parsedNYPGALocalStorage = JSON.parse( nypGALocalStorage );
					var now = new Date().getTime();
					if ( parsedNYPGALocalStorage.clientId && parsedNYPGALocalStorage.expires ) {
						if ( now <= parsedNYPGALocalStorage.expires ) {

							// If we have the clientId, add it to the GA Tracker options.
							if ( parsedNYPGALocalStorage.clientId && '' !== parsedNYPGALocalStorage.clientId ) {
								gaCreateOptions.clientId = parsedNYPGALocalStorage.clientId;
							}
						}
					}
				}

				// Create the tracker instance.
				ga( 'create', gaCreateOptions );

				// Add the clientId to localStorage using readyCallback to ensure the tracker instance has been instantiated.
				ga( function( tracker ) {
					var clientId = tracker.get( 'clientId' );
					if ( clientId ) {
						var gaClientIdStore = JSON.stringify({
							clientId: clientId,
							expires: new Date().getTime() + 1000*60*60*24*365*2
						});
						window.localStorage.setItem( gaClientIdLocalStorageId, gaClientIdStore );
					}

					// Set the client ID as a dimension for tracking against with Aqfer.
					ga( 'set', 'dimension88', clientId );
					window.ga4Dims = window.ga4Dims || {};
					window.ga4Dims.aqfer_puu = clientId;
				});

				if ('function' === typeof CustomEvent) {
					window.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('ga:loaded'));
				}
			})();

			ga('require', 'linker');
ga('linker:autoLink', ["nypost.com","pagesix.com","decider.com"])

			// Optimizely Universal Analytics Integration code
			window.optimizely = window.optimizely || [];
			window.optimizely.push(['activateUniversalAnalytics']);
		</script>

			document.addEventListener( 'DOMContentLoaded', function() {

		<div class="site-header__container">

					<div class="site-header__nav-inner">

<p>No pain no Gaines. </p>



<p>Joanna Gaines had to undergo back surgery right before the holidays, but is grateful that recovering will force her to rest.  </p>



<p>&#8220;I had my first microdiscectomy in 2001 and had to cancel my second date with Chip Carter Gaines and then had the same procedure on another disc two weeks ago,&#8221; Gaines <a href="https://www.instagram.com/p/CmdWFi1OJat/?hl=en" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">captioned a photo Thursday </a>that showed her lying in a hospital bed.</p>



<p>She continued, &#8220;I&#8217;ve always joked that my back likes to act up at the most inconvenient times and I was a bit stressed bc of the timing of it all with the holiday season.</p>


<div id="connatix-outstream-video"></div>
<p>While the HGTV star, 44, was worried to go under the knife so close to Christmas, she later realized &#8220;forced rest&#8221; is a &#8220;gift.&#8221; </p>



<p>Gaines explained that she injured her back while doing a cheerleading stunt in high school, and has been &#8220;dealing with it ever since.&#8221; </p>



<div class="wp-block-image"><figure class="aligncenter"><a href="https://pagesix.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2022/12/joanna-gaines-back-surgery-10.jpg"><button

	<div class="ad__wrapper">

			<div class="ad-wrapper">
		<script  type="text/plain"  class="optanon-category-C0023">
			var adWrapper = document.querySelector('.slideshow-ad-wrapper');
			if (typeof googletag !== 'undefined') {
				googletag.cmd.push(function() {
					if (window.definedSlots && -1 !== window.definedSlots.indexOf("div-gpt-ad-slideshow_article_1")) {
						googletag.display("div-gpt-ad-slideshow_article_1");
					} else {
						console.log('div-gpt-ad-slideshow_article_1 not a defined slot', window.definedSlots || []);
					}
				});
			}
		</script>
	</div>
	</div>	</div>
</div>
		</div>
			</div>
</div>
				</div>
			</div>
					<div class="inline-slideshow__slides">
								<div class="inline-slideshow__slide inline-slideshow__slide--no-swipe">

	</div>

<p>She also took the opportunity to send holiday wishes to her fans and urged them to live in the moment and enjoy themselves. </p>



<p>&#8220;Wishing you and yours a beautiful Christmas week. It may not all go as planned- but may you find the beauty and embrace the wonder of the here and now. ,&#8221; she concluded.</p>

underwent her second microdisectomy. <span class="credit">Instagram/ Joanna Gaines</span></figcaption></figure>



<p>Gaines and her husband Chip Gaines are no strangers to prioritizing their R&amp;R. Back in 2017, the duo quit their HGTV show, Fixer Upper,&nbsp;because they<a href="https://pagesix.com/2017/10/09/the-real-reason-chip-and-joanna-gaines-quit-hgtv/"> need to take a breath.</a></p>

<p>Since then, they have<a href="https://nypost.com/2021/02/12/what-to-expect-from-chip-and-joanna-gaines-magnolia-network/?_gl=1*1smsdr1*_ga*MTQxNTMzMjg3OC4xNjQ1Nzk5NDg4*_ga_0DZ7LHF5PZ*MTY3MTcxOTEwNC4yMjAuMS4xNjcxNzE5NDc2LjAuMC4w&amp;_ga=2.257178059.1371676531.1671458327-1415332878.1645799488"> launched the Magnolia Network</a> in 2021. </p>



<p>Joanna and Chip, 48, celebrated their 19th wedding anniversary earlier this year. </p>

<div class="comments-inline-cta" data-comment-count data-prompt="What do you think?"></div>



<p>&#8220;I like you a lot,&#8221; Joanna<a href="https://www.instagram.com/p/CeSlRRlO1Zr/"> said in a sweet post</a> over the summer to celebrate the milestone with Chip. </p>



<p>The pair <a href="https://pagesix.com/2018/06/23/chip-and-joanna-gaines-welcome-baby-no-5/">share five kids</a>: Drake, 17, Ella, 16, Duke, 14, Emmie, 12, and Crew, 4.</p>
<div id="wpcom-liveblog-container"></div>						</div>

</div><div class="widget-wrapper nypost_dfp_ad_rec_atf_widget widget_nypost_dfp_ad_widget"><div class="ad-slot ad-slot--native ad-slot--no-container">
		<div id="div-gpt-ad-native" class="dfp-div-gpt-ad-native dfp-ad-pagesix" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
			<div id="div-gpt-ad-native" class="dfp-ad dfp-ad-pagesix dfp-native" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
			<div class="ad-wrapper">
		<script  type="text/plain"  class="optanon-category-C0023">
			var adWrapper = document.querySelector('.slideshow-ad-wrapper');
			if (typeof googletag !== 'undefined') {
				googletag.cmd.push(function() {
					if (window.definedSlots && -1 !== window.definedSlots.indexOf("div-gpt-ad-native")) {
						googletag.display("div-gpt-ad-native");
					} else {
						console.log('div-gpt-ad-native not a defined slot', window.definedSlots || []);
					}
				});
			}
		</script>
	</div>
	</div>	</div>
</div>

		  // News Connect Global Identifier
			var ncgGetCookie = function( name ) {
				var regexp = new RegExp( '(?:^' + name + '|;*' + name + ')=(.*?)(?:;|$)', 'g' ),
					result = regexp.exec( document.cookie );

				return ( null === result ) ? null : result[1];
			}

			var ncgId = ncgGetCookie( '_ncg_id_' );
			if ( null !== ncgId ) {
				ga( 'set', 'dimension32', ncgId );
				window.ga4Dims.ncg_id = ncgId;
			}

			var ncgSpId = ncgGetCookie( '_ncg_sp_id\.[^=]*' );
			if ( null !== ncgSpId ) {
				ga( 'set', 'dimension51', ncgSpId );
				window.ga4Dims.ncg_sp_id = ncgSpId;
			}

			var gaAutId = ncgGetCookie( '_autid' );
			if ( null !== gaAutId ) {
				ga( 'set', 'dimension82', gaAutId );
				window.ga4Dims.ga_aut_id = gaAutId;
			}

			// Get Amazon links.
			var hasAmazon = "false";
			var links = document.links;
			var amazonLinks = [];
			for (var i = 0; links.length > i; i++) {
				if (
					links[i].href.indexOf('amazon.com') > 0
					&& !links[i].classList.contains('buy-button')
				) {
					var gaEventData = '';
					var amazonGaEvent = JSON.stringify({
						category: 'affiliate ecommerce click',
						action: 'amazon',
						label: links[i].href
					});
					  var amazonGa4Event = JSON.stringify({
						event_name: 'ux_engagement',
						source_unit: 'amazon',
						source_position: i + 1
					});

					if (links[i].dataset.gaEvent) {
						var currentGaEvent = links[i].dataset.gaEvent;
						if (Array.isArray(currentGaEvent)) {
							currentGaEvent.push(amazonGaEvent);
							gaEventData = currentGaEvent;
						} else {
							gaEventData = '['+currentGaEvent+','+amazonGaEvent+']';
						}
					} else {
						gaEventData = amazonGaEvent;
					}
				  if (links[i].dataset.ga4Event) {
						var currentGa4Event = links[i].dataset.ga4Event;
						if (Array.isArray(currentGa4Event)) {
							currentGa4Event.push(amazonGa4Event);
							ga4EventData = currentGa4Event;
						} else {
							ga4EventData = '['+currentGa4Event+','+amazonGa4Event+']';
						}
				  } else {
						ga4EventData = amazonGa4Event;
				  }

											links[i].setAttribute(
							'data-ga-event',
							gaEventData
						);
						links[i].setAttribute(
							'data-ga4-event',
							ga4EventData
						);
					
					amazonLinks.push(links[i].href);
					hasAmazon = "amazon";
				}
			}
			ga('set', 'dimension46', hasAmazon);
			window.ga4Dims.contains_commerce_link = hasAmazon;

		  if (amazonLinks.length > 0) {
				ga('set', 'dimension47', amazonLinks.join());
				window.ga4Dims.commerce_links = amazonLinks.join();
			}
			ga('require', 'linkid', 'linkid.js');
			ga('require', 'displayfeatures');
			ga('set', "contentGroup1", "article");
ga('set', "contentGroup2", "celebrity-news");
ga('set', "contentGroup3", "pagesix.com");

					</script>
				<script type="text/javascript">
			// Send an event on clicks for link elements with data-nyp-affiliate="true", wait until the document has loaded.
			document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
				const affiliateLinks = document.querySelectorAll('a[data-nyp-affiliate="true"]');
				// Return early if we don't have any links.
				if ( ! affiliateLinks ) {
					return;
				}
				// Loop through the links and add the event listener.
				affiliateLinks.forEach(function(link) {
					link.addEventListener('click', function(event) {

						const {
							nypScripts: {
								nypost_wp_vars: {
									nypostSite: siteId = '',
								} = {},
							} = {},
						} = window;

						// Check if we are on the element with the a[data-nyp-affiliate="true"].
						let link = event.target;
						if ( 'true' !== link.dataset.nypAffiliate ) {
							// If not, get the closest one then get the href from that.
							link = event.target.closest('a[data-nyp-affiliate="true"]');
						}

						// Get the URL from the link.
						let href = link.href || '';

						// Bail if we don't have a href.
						if ( ! href ) {
							return;
						}

						// If the URL does not have the protocol we need to add it or URL() will throw an error.
						if (!href.startsWith('http://') && !href.startsWith('https://')) {
							href = 'https://' + href;
						}

						// Get the URL from the link.
						if (href.match(new RegExp(`https?://go.${siteId}.com/`))) {
							// Extract the URL from the skimlinks href.
							href = new URL(href).searchParams.get('url') || href;
						}

						// Get the URL hostname, for example: www.amazon.com.
						const retailer = new URL(href).hostname;

						gtag('event', 'outbound', {
							'internal_source': window.location.href,
							'external_destination': href,
							'retailer': retailer,
							'post_id': "6588806",
						});
					});
				});
			});
		</script>

on Thu, 25 Apr 2024 19:58:59 GMT for 2e1a7635baef30f20e74d5dc4eb50ccf","wp_media_id":"dl7h2Bnv","wp_media_length":"121.643","wp_media_platform":"jw-player","wp_post_content":"<!-- wp:nypost-newspress\/multi-titles \/-->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>Sixty, here she comes. <\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>Vivica A. Fox and Kevin Daniels stopped by the Page Six studio this week to <a href=\"https:\/\/pagesix.com\/video\/vivica-a-fox-discusses-new-film-not-another-church-movie-and-jamie-foxx-clone-conspiracies\/\">chat about their upcoming film<\/a>, \"Not Another Church Movie\" \u2014 and along with sharing more about her busy career, Fox spilled some of her best skincare tips. <\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>The \"Independence Day\" star \u2014 who will turn 60 on July 30 \u2014 looks younger than ever these days, crediting her glowing skin, in part, to regular spa treatments. <\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:image {\"align\":\"center\",\"id\":7686386,\"sizeSlug\":\"large\",\"linkDestination\":\"none\",\"credits\":\"Brian Zak for Page Six\",\"chpId\":\"NYPICHPDPICT000080734648\"} -->\n<figure class=\"wp-block-image aligncenter size-large\"><img src=\"https:\/\/pagesix.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/sites\/3\/2024\/04\/vivica-fox-kevin-daniels-page-80734648.jpg?w=1024\" alt=\"Vivica A. Fox and Kevin Daniels in the page six studio\" class=\"wp-image-7686386\" \/><figcaption class=\"wp-element-caption\">Fox wore a sparkly blue blazer and black minidress to the studio.<\/figcaption><\/figure>\n<!-- \/wp:image -->\n\n<!-- wp:image {\"align\":\"center\",\"id\":7686392,\"sizeSlug\":\"large\",\"linkDestination\":\"none\",\"credits\":\"Brian Zak for Page Six\",\"chpId\":\"NYPICHPDPICT000080734646\"} -->\n<figure class=\"wp-block-image aligncenter size-large\"><img src=\"https:\/\/pagesix.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/sites\/3\/2024\/04\/vivica-fox-kevin-daniels-page-80734646.jpg?w=1024\" alt=\"Vivica A. Fox and Kevin Daniels in the page six studio\" class=\"wp-image-7686392\" \/><figcaption class=\"wp-element-caption\">The duo chatted about their upcoming project, \"Not Another Church Movie.\"<\/figcaption><\/figure>\n<!-- \/wp:image -->\n\n<!-- wp:image {\"align\":\"center\",\"id\":7686298,\"sizeSlug\":\"large\",\"linkDestination\":\"none\",\"credits\":\"Getty Images For NAACP\",\"chpId\":\"NYPICHPDPICT000078411338\"} -->\n<figure class=\"wp-block-image aligncenter size-large\"><img src=\"https:\/\/pagesix.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/sites\/3\/2024\/04\/vivica-fox-attends-naacp-image-78411338.jpg?w=683\" alt=\"Vivica A. Fox\" class=\"wp-image-7686298\" \/><figcaption class=\"wp-element-caption\">Fox tells Page Six that she loves Dermalogica skincare products.<\/figcaption><\/figure>\n<!-- \/wp:image -->\n\n<!-- wp:nypost-editor\/primary-tag {\"module_type\":\"trending\",\"primary_tag\":194120,\"primary_section\":417140050,\"align\":\"center\",\"supportsAlign\":true,\"lock\":{\"remove\":false}} \/-->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>\"Oh, I love microdermabrasion, oxygen facials. I'm a spa junkie, and I use <a href=\"https:\/\/shop-links.co\/1840554405213002844?u1=----\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer noopener\">Dermalogica skin products<\/a> as well too,\" Fox tells Page Six's Astra.<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>However, her top tip is a simple one. <\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>\"But mainly I tell everyone, clean your skin. Make sure you take care of your skin, take your makeup off at night,\" she says. <\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:block {\"ref\":6718083} \/-->\n\n<!-- wp:image {\"align\":\"center\",\"id\":7686397,\"sizeSlug\":\"large\",\"linkDestination\":\"none\",\"credits\":\"Brian Zak for Page Six\",\"chpId\":\"NYPICHPDPICT000080734653\"} -->\n<figure class=\"wp-block-image aligncenter size-large\"><img src=\"https:\/\/pagesix.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/sites\/3\/2024\/04\/vivica-fox-kevin-daniels-page-80734653.jpg?w=1024\" alt=\"Vivica A. Fox and Kevin Daniels in the page six studio\" class=\"wp-image-7686397\" \/><figcaption class=\"wp-element-caption\">Fox wore a sparkling diamond nameplate necklace and hoop earrings for her visit to Page Six.<\/figcaption><\/figure>\n<!-- \/wp:image -->\n\n<!-- wp:image {\"align\":\"center\",\"id\":7686306,\"sizeSlug\":\"large\",\"linkDestination\":\"none\",\"credits\":\"msvfox\/Instagram\",\"chpId\":\"NYPICHPDPICT000080733096\"} -->\n<figure class=\"wp-block-image aligncenter size-large\"><img src=\"https:\/\/pagesix.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/sites\/3\/2024\/04\/www-instagram-com-p-c4x4di7ltct-80733096.jpg?w=819\" alt=\"Vivica A. Fox\" class=\"wp-image-7686306\" \/><figcaption class=\"wp-element-caption\">The star will turn 60 this summer.<\/figcaption><\/figure>\n<!-- \/wp:image -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>\"You can hold onto them lashes, but please clean the face at night!\" the actress quips.<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>As for Daniels, his routine is a little more simple, involving \"hot water\" and \"a little moisturizer ... and then lay down.\"<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>Fox also chatted about her Vivica A. Fox Hair Collection, telling us that she donates \"40 wigs to women going through chemotherapy\" each year. <\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:nyp-membership\/comments \/-->\n\n<!-- wp:image {\"align\":\"center\",\"id\":7686398,\"sizeSlug\":\"large\",\"linkDestination\":\"none\",\"credits\":\"Christopher Peterson \/ SplashNews.com\",\"chpId\":\"NYPICHPDPICT000077345893\"} -->\n<figure class=\"wp-block-image aligncenter size-large\"><img src=\"https:\/\/pagesix.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/sites\/3\/2024\/04\/vivica-fox-wears-pink-lace-77345893.jpg?w=1024\" alt=\"Vivica A. Fox\" class=\"wp-image-7686398\" \/><figcaption class=\"wp-element-caption\">The star tells us that she gets regular oxygen facials.<\/figcaption><\/figure>\n<!-- \/wp:image -->\n\n<!-- wp:image {\"align\":\"center\",\"id\":7686357,\"sizeSlug\":\"large\",\"linkDestination\":\"none\",\"credits\":\"WireImage\",\"chpId\":\"NYPICHPDPICT000078547730\"} -->\n<figure class=\"wp-block-image aligncenter size-large\"><img src=\"https:\/\/pagesix.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/sites\/3\/2024\/04\/vivica-fox-attends-55th-annual-78547730.jpg?w=683\" alt=\"Vivica A. Fox\" class=\"wp-image-7686357\" \/><figcaption class=\"wp-element-caption\">She sparkled at the 2024 NAACP Awards.<\/figcaption><\/figure>\n<!-- \/wp:image -->\n\n<!-- wp:nypost-editor\/newsletter {\"align\":\"center\",\"newsletterList\":\"128388\",\"newsletterHeadline\":\"Shop 'til you drop with Post Wanted\",\"newsletterCopy\":\"Save time and money with the latest deals, discounts, trends, reviews and more.\",\"newsletterSuccessCTA\":\"Never miss a story with New York Post newsletters.\"} \/-->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>\"For a woman to lose her hair it can be devastating,\" the Batman &amp; Robin\" star says, explaining that her company supports women in Philadelphia who are dealing with cancer. <\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>Fox, who started her hair business 16 years ago, tells us that she \"got teased\" for \"selling wigs\" when she first launched the company. <\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>However, she's had the last laugh, explaining \"the hair line industry generates over a billion dollars a year.\" <\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>The Tyler Perry spoof flick, \"Not Another Church Movie,\" hits theaters on May 10. <\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->","wp_post_date":"April 26, 2024","wp_post_ga_dimensions":"{\"dimension3\":\"aging,skincare,vivica a. fox,\\\/beauty\",\"dimension2\":\"Kristin Contino,Astra Viola\",\"dimension1\":\"article\",\"dimension5\":\"standard\",\"dimension6\":\"'Spa junkie' Vivica A. \/-->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p><a href=\"https:\/\/pagesix.com\/2024\/04\/16\/entertainment\/kelly-clarksons-ex-brandon-blackstock-responds-to-her-new-lawsuit\/\">Brandon Blackstock has responded<\/a> to his ex-wife <a href=\"https:\/\/pagesix.com\/2023\/11\/30\/entertainment\/brandon-blackstock-ordered-to-return-millions-to-kelly-clarkson\/\">Kelly Clarkson\u2019s latest lawsuit<\/a> in which she claimed he should pay her more than the $2.6 million that a California labor commissioner ruled he owed her for illegally acting like an \u201cunlicensed talent agency\u201d since 2007. Brandon argued the filing should be dismissed because the commissioner\u2019s ruling was made in <a href=\"https:\/\/pagesix.com\/2022\/03\/08\/kelly-clarkson-and-brandon-blackstock-reach-divorce-settlement\/\">November 2023. <\/a>Watch the full video to see <a marriage.<\/a> Over on \"The Real Housewives of Potomac\" Robyn Dixon admitted <a wp:nypost-newspress\/multi-titles \/-->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>Kendra Wilkinson's son is all grown up \u2014 and prep school bound!<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>The reality star <a href=\"https:\/\/www.instagram.com\/p\/C6J9lfPv6GV\/?hl=en\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">shared a rare snap<\/a> of her and ex-husband Hank Baskett's 14-year-old, Hank Jr., via Instagram Wednesday.<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>\"Congratulations\u00a0@hank_baskett12,\" she gushed.\u00a0\"I love you so much and watched you work hard to get to where you are. I\u2019m so proud of you my boy. Keep going!!! @oakschristianschool\u00a0#oclionpride2024.\"<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:image Next Door\" alum, 38, disabled the comments for the social media upload, which featured her teen holding his admissions letter while wearing an Oaks Christian shirt.<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph \"beyond blessed to be given the opportunity to further [his] education and athletics\" at the Los Angeles County school.<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>Many of Wilkinson's fans commented on \"how he's grown,\" with one noting that \"he definitely has Kendra\u2019s high cheekbones.\"<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:image that he is 6 feet 2 inches tall, often posts highlights from his budding basketball career.<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>Wilkinson and Baskett, 41, <a href=\"https:\/\/nypost.com\/2009\/06\/10\/kendra-wilkinson-pregnant\/\">welcomed their son in 2009<\/a>, followed by daughter Alijah, now 9, five years later.<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- 2018 amid a cheating scandal and have <a href=\"https:\/\/pagesix.com\/2023\/05\/30\/kendra-wilkinson-will-always-love-ex-husband-hank-baskett\/\">co-parented their children<\/a> ever since.<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>\"Hank is an amazing father, an amazing co-parent, and he deserves all good things,\" the \"Kendra Sells Hollywood\" star <a \"What he did in my marriage doesn\u2019t define him to me today.<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>\"We\u2019re co-parenting really well,\" she continued. \"It\u2019s what divorce is about. marriage","NEWSBREAK_MEDIA_ID":"509648","OTT_DESCRIPTION":"","SOURCEFILE_NAME":"BON_JOVI_MARRIAGE_042324_KS","original_mediaid":"Uczpg43m","wp_media_id":"asu0cTM3","wp_media_length":"46.934","wp_media_platform":"jw-player","wp_post_content":"<!-- wp:nypost-newspress\/multi-titles \/-->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>Jon Bon Jovi walked the red carpet alone at Hulu's Special screening of \"Thank You Goodnight: The Bon Jovi Story\" on Thursday night. <\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>Held at IPIC Theater, the singer's wife, Dorothea Hurley, was notably absent for the photo op following the \"Livin' On a Prayer\" singer's recent admission that he <a href=\"https:\/\/pagesix.com\/2024\/04\/23\/entertainment\/jon-bon-jovi-admits-he-hasnt-been-a-saint-in-marriage-to-dorothea-hurley\/\">hasn't \"been a saint\" throughout their marriage<\/a>. <\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>Bon Jovi, 62, wore a black T-shirt and paired it with a black leather jacket and a pair of denim jeans. <\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>During the Cinema Society event, Bon Jovi told the crowd he would tell his younger self \"to enjoy the moment, because the moments are fleeting. I would have told that kid to look up once in a while and enjoy the ride.\"<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:image {\"align\":\"center\",\"id\":7686876,\"sizeSlug\":\"large\",\"credits\":\"Adela Loconte\/Shutterstock\",\"chpId\":\"NYPICHPDPICT000080707186\"} -->\n<figure class=\"wp-block-image aligncenter size-large\"><img src=\"https:\/\/pagesix.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/sites\/3\/2024\/04\/bon-jovi-story-ipic-theaters-80707186.jpg?w=683\" alt=\"Jon Bon Jovi red carpet photo\" class=\"wp-image-7686876\" \/><figcaption class=\"wp-element-caption\">Jon Bon Jovi walked the red carpet alone at a special screening of Hulu's \"Thank You, Goodnight\" documentary on Thursday night. <\/figcaption><\/figure>\n<!-- \/wp:image -->\n\n<!-- wp:image {\"align\":\"center\",\"id\":7686892,\"sizeSlug\":\"large\",\"credits\":\"Getty Images\",\"chpId\":\"NYPICHPDPICT000080690783\"} -->\n<figure class=\"wp-block-image aligncenter size-large\"><img src=\"https:\/\/pagesix.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/sites\/3\/2024\/04\/jon-bon-jovi-attends-thank-80690783.jpg?w=1024\" alt=\"Jon Bon Jovi red carpet photo\" class=\"wp-image-7686892\" \/><figcaption class=\"wp-element-caption\">The singer's wife, Dorothea, was notably absent for the event following her husband's recent admission of having not been \"a saint\" in their marriage. <\/figcaption><\/figure>\n<!-- \/wp:image -->\n\n<!-- wp:nypost-editor\/primary-tag {\"module_type\":\"trending\",\"primary_tag\":442615,\"primary_section\":417140040,\"align\":\"center\",\"supportsAlign\":true,\"lock\":{\"remove\":false}} \/-->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>We're told that following the screening, celebs swarmed the rocker at an afterparty at Jean-Georges' The Fulton, where stars including Jennifer Esposito, Will Estes, Denis O'Hare, Ari Melber and Maye Musk sang along karaoke-style to \"Livin' on a Prayer.\"<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>Earlier Thursday morning, the singer gave fans some <a href=\"https:\/\/pagesix.com\/2024\/04\/25\/entertainment\/jon-bon-jovi-calls-magic-dorothea-hurley-marriage-a-daily-challenge\/\">insight into his marriage<\/a> with Hurley while giving his son, Jake Bongiovi, 21, advice on his upcoming nuptials with \"Stranger Things\" star Millie Bobby Brown. <\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>\u201cThe magic for me has just been growing together with Dorothea,\u201d he said. Though, he admitted that \u201cevery day is a challenge and a change.\u201d<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>He added: \u201cBut if you\u2019re growing together, hopefully things will work out.\" <\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:nypost-editor\/newsletter {\"align\":\"center\",\"newsletterList\":\"53382\",\"newsletterHeadline\":\"Want more celebrity and pop culture news?\",\"newsletterCopy\":\"Start your day with Page Six Daily.\",\"newsletterSuccessCTA\":\"Want celebrity news as it breaks? been a saint, but not being a fool enough to f\u2013k up the home life, either,\" the singer said in an interview with The Independent earlier this month. <\/figcaption><\/figure>\n<!-- \/wp:image long.<\/figcaption><\/figure>\n<!-- \/wp:image -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>Earlier this month, the Grammy winner also opened up about the hardships he's gone through in his marriage when he credited his wife's patience and tolerance of his infidelity as the reason his marriage has lasted so long. <\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>\u201cThese are all the wonderful clich\u00e9s of rock stardom,\u201d he told <a href=\"https:\/\/www.independent.co.uk\/arts-entertainment\/music\/features\/jon-bon-jovi-millie-bobby-brown-tour-surgery-b2531487.html\">The Independent<\/a> in an interview published Sunday. <\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>\u201cIt\u2019s about never lying about having been a saint, but not being a fool enough to have grown up together.\u201d<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>The rockstar married Hurley, his high school sweetheart, at the Graceland Chapel in Las Vegas in wp:nypost-newspress\/multi-titles \/-->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>He was planning to break bad.<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>Giancarlo Esposito admitted he was once in such dire financial straits that he actually considered killing himself so his family could get insurance money.<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>\"That's how low I was,\" the 65-year-old actor, who eventually went on to star in \"Breaking Bad\" and many other shows, <a href=\"https:\/\/www.youtube.com\/watch?v=y2q8hMXCKGo\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">said during a recent episode of SiriusXM's \"Jim and Sam Show.\"<\/a><\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:image {\"align\":\"center\",\"id\":7671692,\"sizeSlug\":\"large\",\"credits\":\"Jim and Sam Show\/YouTube\",\"chpId\":\"NYPICHPDPICT000080372967\"} -->\n<figure class=\"wp-block-image aligncenter size-large\"><img src=\"https:\/\/pagesix.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/sites\/3\/2024\/04\/giancarlo-esposito-says-scheming-murder-80372967.jpg\" alt=\"Giancarlo Esposito Jim Norton &amp; Sam Roberts show\" class=\"wp-image-7671692\" \/><figcaption class=\"wp-element-caption\">Giancarlo Esposito says before he reached success with \"Breaking Bad,\" he once considered planning his own murder.<\/figcaption><\/figure>\n<!-- \/wp:image -->\n\n<!-- wp:image {\"align\":\"center\",\"id\":7671694,\"sizeSlug\":\"large\",\"credits\":\"Jim and Sam Show\/YouTube\",\"chpId\":\"NYPICHPDPICT000080372990\"} -->\n<figure class=\"wp-block-image aligncenter size-large\"><img src=\"https:\/\/pagesix.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/sites\/3\/2024\/04\/giancarlo-esposito-says-scheming-murder-80372990.jpg\" alt=\"Giancarlo Esposito Jim Norton &amp; Sam Roberts show\" class=\"wp-image-7671694\" \/><figcaption class=\"wp-element-caption\">At the time, the actor was in dire financial straits.<\/figcaption><\/figure>\n<!-- \/wp:image -->\n\n<!-- wp:image {\"align\":\"center\",\"id\":7671702,\"sizeSlug\":\"large\",\"credits\":\"Getty Images\",\"chpId\":\"NYPICHPDPICT000080373113\"} -->\n<figure class=\"wp-block-image aligncenter size-large\"><img src=\"https:\/\/pagesix.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/sites\/3\/2024\/04\/actor-giancarlo-esposito-daughters-attend-80373113.jpg?w=1024\" alt=\"Giancarlo Esposito with family.\" class=\"wp-image-7671702\" \/><figcaption class=\"wp-element-caption\">\"That's how low I was,\" he said during a recent episode of SiriusXM's \"Jim and Sam Show.\"<\/figcaption><\/figure>\n<!-- \/wp:image -->\n\n<!-- wp:nypost-editor\/primary-tag {\"module_type\":\"trending\",\"primary_tag\":3920209,\"primary_section\":417140046,\"align\":\"center\",\"supportsAlign\":true,\"lock\":{\"remove\":false}} \/-->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>\"My way out in my brain was: \u2018Hey, do you get life insurance if someone commits suicide? Do they get the bread?'\" Giancarlo explained. \"My wife had no idea why I was asking this stuff. I started scheming.\"<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>He thought if he could get someone to kill him, \"death through misadventure,\" as he called it, his wife and four children would get the insurance.<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>\"I wanted them to have a life. It was a hard time in life. I literally thought of self-annihilation so that they could survive,\" he said. <\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:image {\"align\":\"center\",\"id\":7671711,\"sizeSlug\":\"large\",\"credits\":\"Ursula Coyote \/ AMC\",\"chpId\":\"NYPICHPDPICT000019686679\"} -->\n<figure class=\"wp-block-image aligncenter size-large\"><img src=\"https:\/\/pagesix.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/sites\/3\/2024\/04\/tv-still-purge-breaking-bad-19686679.jpg?w=1024\" alt=\"Giancarlo Esposito as Gus Fring &quot;Breaking Bad&quot;\" class=\"wp-image-7671711\" \/><figcaption class=\"wp-element-caption\">\"I had four kids. I wanted them to have a life. It was a hard time in life,\" he continued. <\/figcaption><\/figure>\n<!-- \/wp:image -->\n\n<!-- wp:image {\"align\":\"center\",\"id\":7671704,\"sizeSlug\":\"large\",\"credits\":\"Ursula Coyote \/ AMC\",\"chpId\":\"NYPICHPDPICT000031981365\"} -->\n<figure class=\"wp-block-image aligncenter size-large\"><img src=\"https:\/\/pagesix.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/sites\/3\/2024\/04\/walter-white-bryan-cranston-breaking-31981365.jpg?w=1024\" alt=\"Giancarlo Esposito &quot;Breaking Bad&quot; still\" class=\"wp-image-7671704\" \/><figcaption class=\"wp-element-caption\">Esposito starred as Gus Fring on \"Breaking Bad,\" which ran from 2009-2013 and \"Better Call Saul\"  which ran from 2017-2022. <\/figcaption><\/figure>\n<!-- \/wp:image -->\n\n<!-- wp:nypost-editor\/newsletter {\"align\":\"center\",\"newsletterList\":\"53382\",\"newsletterHeadline\":\"Want more celebrity and pop culture news?\",\"newsletterCopy\":\"Start your day with Page Six Daily.\",\"newsletterSuccessCTA\":\"Want celebrity news as it breaks? Hooked on Housewives?\"} \/-->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>\"That was the first inkling to me that there was a way out, but I wouldn't be here to be available to it, or be there for my kids,\" he added.<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>Ultimately, he decided that he couldn't go through with any plan like that because it would leave his family traumatized.<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:block {\"ref\":6718050} \/-->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>\"I started to think that's not viable because of the pain I would cause them, and it would be lifelong \u2014 and lifelong trauma that would just extend the generational trauma which I'm trying to move away from,\" Esposito said. <\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:image {\"align\":\"center\",\"id\":7671698,\"sizeSlug\":\"large\",\"credits\":\"Getty Images\",\"chpId\":\"NYPICHPDPICT000076068472\"} -->\n<figure class=\"wp-block-image aligncenter size-large\"><img src=\"https:\/\/pagesix.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/sites\/3\/2024\/04\/giancarlo-esposito-seen-onstage-amc-76068472.jpg?w=706\" alt=\"Giancarlo Esposito seen onstage at the AMC Networks media presentation.\" class=\"wp-image-7671698\" \/><figcaption class=\"wp-element-caption\">Esposito collected three Emmy nominations for his role in the \"Breaking Bad\" universe. <\/figcaption><\/figure>\n<!-- \/wp:image -->\n\n<!-- wp:image {\"align\":\"center\",\"id\":7671713,\"sizeSlug\":\"large\",\"credits\":\"Alyssa Moran\/AMC\",\"chpId\":\"NYPICHPDPICT000078740207\"} -->\n<figure class=\"wp-block-image aligncenter size-large\"><img src=\"https:\/\/pagesix.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/sites\/3\/2024\/04\/parish-season-1-episode-2-78740207.jpg?w=1024\" alt=\"Giancarlo Esposito as Gray Bourgeois in &quot;Parish.&quot;\" class=\"wp-image-7671713\" \/><figcaption class=\"wp-element-caption\">He later took on several more notable roles on shows like Disney's \"The Mandalorian\" and \"Parish\" after the show ended in 2013. <\/figcaption><\/figure>\n<!-- \/wp:image -->\n\n<!-- wp:nyp-membership\/comments \/-->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>Esposito, who shares daughters who shares daughters Shayne, Ruby, Kale and Syrlucia with ex-wife Joy McManigal, went on to receive three Emmy award nominations for his role as Gus Fring on \"Breaking Bad\" and \"Better Call Saul.\" <\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>After the show wrapped in 2013, he went on to complete other notable roles in shows like \"Godfather of Harlem,\" \"The Boys,\" and \"Parish.\" <\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>The \"Mandalorian\" actor called the Bryan Cranston-led series \"the light at the end of the tunnel.\"<\/p>\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>The \u201cReal Housewives of Miami\u201d star issued a second statement about now-estranged husband Todd Nepola\u2019s decision to end their marriage, writing on her Instagram Story Wednesday, \u201cThe outpouring [of] love and support that I have received from all of you has truly warmed my heart.<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>\"Thank you \u2764\ufe0f,\" she added. \"\u2764\ufe0fLove you all \u2764\ufe0f.\"<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:image court, stating in legal documents that their marriage was \u201cirretrievably broken.\u201d<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:block {\"ref\":6718094} \/-->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>The documents also noted that Alexia, 56, and Todd, 51, signed a prenuptial agreement on Dec. 10, 2021 \u2013 six days before they married. The details of the prenup remain confidential.<\/p>\n<!-- \/wp:paragraph -->\n\n<!-- wp:paragraph -->\n<p>The Bravolebrity has yet to respond legally to Todd's divorce petition, but she spoke out on <script type="text/javascript">
	var windowOpen;
	document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
		const shareLinks = document.querySelectorAll('li.share-facebook a');
		shareLinks.forEach(function(shareLink) {
			// Exclude email from opening in modal window.
			if ( shareLink.href.indexOf('mailto') !== -1 ) {
				return;
			}

			shareLink.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
				event.preventDefault();
				if ( 'undefined' !== typeof windowOpen ){ // If there's another sharing window open, close it.
					windowOpen.close();
				}
				windowOpen = window.open( shareLink.href, 'wpcomfacebook', 'menubar=1,resizable=1,width=600,height=400' );
			});
		});
	});
</script>
